availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Wasson (Fayette County, Kentucky, farmer and curator of Kentucky Univ)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, university curator. Pennsylvania native. Married to Sarah E. Hearne Wasson. Father of Evalina Wasson, John M. Wasson, Joseph Wasson, Barton Wasson, and Sarah Wasson. Farmer in Fayette County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1850. Farmer in Fayette County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1860. Member of the board of curators of Kentucky University in 1865.
